features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新新增分屏保存和水印编辑功能，平行空间新增防跟踪功能，支持智慧识物-购物功能，优化通知栏显示效果和流畅动效体验，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
新增相机水印可编辑功能，可自行添加和还原水印，体验路径：图库>水印照片>编辑>水印图标。
新增分屏保存功能，分屏状态下点击分屏线中间按钮，可将分屏组合以图标形式保存在桌面，后续通过点击该图标即可快捷打开此分屏组合。
优化通知栏布局显示，界面呈现更加简洁美观。
新增支持智慧识物-购物功能。
优化文件夹打开动效、图库旋转动效、快捷方式返回桌面动效等流畅动效体验。
新增防跟踪功能，体验路径: 平行空间>设置>位置和广告>防位置跟踪或防广告跟踪。
合入安卓2024年8月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2024/8
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this recommended update allows you to edit watermarks and save app combinations in split-screen mode, and you can be redirected to the shopping page after AI object recognition. This update also introduces Anti-tracking function in Parallel Space. Additionally, this release optimizes the display effect of notification panel and the motion effects in some scenarios, as well as incorporating a security patch.
Watermarks can be added and removed as desired. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Watermarked photos > Edit > Watermarks.

App combinations in split-screen mode can now be saved. In split-screen mode, tap the button in the middle of the divider to save the combination as an icon on the home screen. Tap the icon enables quick access to the combination.
The layout of notification panel is optimized, making the interface more streamlined and visually appealing.
You can be redirected to the shopping page after AI object recognition.
The animation for opening a folder is improved. Additionally, the screen rotation in Gallery is smoother, and the motion effect for returning to the home screen from a shortcut is enhanced.
Anti-tracking function is incorporated. Try it out by going to: Parallel Space > Settings > Location and advertising > Select Location preferences or Ad preferences.

Android security patch (Aug 2024) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2024/8

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating. 2. Check out more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any problem during use, please get support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
